snippet.title: Primordials Legends: Hollow Hero -  Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Primordials Legends: Hollow Hero tells the tale of Brunt, an anthropomorphic combat wombat on her first adventure in the fantasy world, Eridal. Embark on this epic 3rd person action-filled adventure, uncover how this world came to be, and meet new legends that will help shape the future of Eridal!

Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1727540/Primordials_Legends_Hollow_Hero/

Kickstarter goes live 16th September! 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/tbxgames/primordials-legends-hollow-hero?fbclid=IwAR0VC5GIxDjjQl-DlFnsEsIF5-FHvOJcbf3wuw99vUDKnIon4h8d3G3OM-I

Follow us on social: 
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/8b33nYQ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tbxgames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tbxgames
Website: https://www.toyboxgamesstudios.com/hollow-hero/
